flashLumaTarget.description: Tune lux-based luma target specifically for flash

enableFlashTarget.description: Enable separate luma target for flash snapshot capture

flashTarget.description: Luma target tuning structure, which is shared between normal and flash use case.

zoneTrigger.description: lux level start and end values that define trigger region

zoneData.description: Triggered data: Luma targets that will be adjusted based on lux level

lumaTarget.description: Luma target value for each zone with 8 bit range.

zoneTrigger.description: lux level start and end values that define trigger region

zoneData.description: Triggered data: Luma targets that will be adjusted based on lux level

lumaTarget.description: Luma target value for each zone with 8 bit range.

zoneTrigger.description: lux level start and end values that define trigger region

zoneData.description: Triggered data: Luma targets that will be adjusted based on lux level

lumaTarget.description: Luma target value for each zone with 8 bit range.

flashInfluenceTargetInterpolation.description: Interpolation between normal target and flash target is done by measuring the influence of flash: No influence (min: 1.0) should use normal target whereas strong influence (about 5.0 and above) should use flash target.

smartFlash.description: Smart flash uses a bias table computed by comparing stats before and after preflash to better expose scenes that have both foreground and background features

enableSmartFlashEst.description: Enable metering scene using flash influence bias table

minOffStats.description: Off stats value will be set to this value as to make the on_stats/off_stats ratio robust to noise

kFloorPct.description: Percentile threshold to compress flash influence. The larger this value the more emphasis on small reflective objects

enableSpeckleHandling.description: This feature allows saturation to happen if there is still saturation after flash convergence

speckleSatPctRange.description: Saturation pct range within which we will decrease influence of region. Above this range influence of region is decreased to minimum. Lower range to make speckle detection kick in more often.

statsPreprocessing.description: Preflash metering defines which regions are influenced by flash. It also speeds up preflash convergence sequence.

thresBrightLevelDiff.description: During preflash convergence: Y region is still too bright if larger than thresBrightLevel + thresBrightLevelDiff. The lower this value the more likely convergence will adjust after preflash turns on

thresBrightLevel.description: Mark Y region as bright when above this threshold

thresBrightSatDiff.description: During preflash convergence: Y region is saturated if sat percentage is larger than thresBrightSat + thresBrightSatDiff. The lower this value the more likely convergence will adjust after preflash turns on

thresBrightSat.description: Mark Y region as bright when above this threshold

minLuma.description: Preflash convergence will stop if luma drops below this threshold

minLumaAdj.description: Minimum adjustment during preflash convergence. The larger this value the more precise convergence but also the longer it takes to converge

minLumaAdjDynamic.description: Adds flexibility on min adjustment size based on ratio of saturated stats

minLumaAdjEnd.description: largest adjustment if stats exceed preflashSatRegionPercHigh. minimum adjustment is controlled by minLumaAdj

FDFlash.description: This feature runs face detection during preflash sequence and then exposes the snapshot image using face detection ROI. It can also be tuned to extend the preflash sequence and give more time for face detection to run.

enableFDFlash.description: Enable face detection ROI metering for flash snapshot

ledFaceWeight.description: Weight range assigned to face depending on face size (small face will use start weight large face will sue end weight). Leverages dominant face AEC

ledFaceSize.description: Face size pct range that controls metering weight. Leverages dominant face AEC

FDFlashFrameCount.description: Threshold on the maximum number of frames the algorithm will wait for face detection

faceSizeExpEffect.description: Range of face size within which the effect of flash face detection phases in and out. Large face should make full use of FD metering

statsUpdateDelayTimeEnter.description: Specify the delay in seconds to declare Face ROI officially comes into effect (for detection stability)

statsUpdateDelayTimeExit.description: Specify the delay in seconds to declare Face ROI officially exits (for detection stability)

dynamicDelay.description: Shorten preflash sequence: Adds more conditions before adding extra FD frame delay during preflash.

enableFDDynamicDelay.description: enable additional feature that will not extend preflash sequence if light level is good

minLumaToSkipPreFD.description: luma threshold before preflash; if luma higher: no additional preflash delay for running face detection

flashTuningBreak.description: How many seconds for sensor to cool down after fire during flash tuning

preflashConv.description: Tuning for convergence during preflash phase of flash snapshot

frameSkipMethod.description: Specifies which type of frame skip is desired: SmoothNoSkip for smooth convergence, SkipOne if there are synchronization concerns, SkipSystemLatency if speed is preferred to smoothness

aggressiveness.description: The larger this value the faster the convergence

settledFrameCountThres.description: Number of additional frames to wait before declaring settled and computing flash snapshot parameters. Can be reduced if sensor sync is reliable

preflashFrameCounterEnter.description: Flash measurement configuration. These parameters apply to both flash tuning and flash calibration

preflashFrameCounterExit.description: Flash measurement configuration. These parameters apply to both flash tuning and flash calibration

dynamicEnterSkip.description: Optimize duration of preflash sequence: reduce preflash enter frame skip count if frame rate is low

enableDynamicEnterSkip.description: Enable dynamic calculation of preflash enter frame skip count based on FPS

preflashMinFrameSkip.description: Frame skip count corresponding to min fps. Max fps corresponds to parameter preflashFrameCounterEnter. Skips for FPS in-between FPSRange start and end are interpolated

flashMeasurementConv.description: Tuning settings for initial convergence algorithms: FastAEC and AggressiveAEC

firstFrameBias.description: Heuristics to speed up convergence in first frame

enableStartUpBias.description: Enable biasing to converge faster in the first frame in the presence of saturated regions

firstFrameStepSizeDarkMax.description: When converging from dark to bright: maximum absolute exposure index step size for first frame

stepSizeBrightAdjRange.description: When converging from bright to dark: Exposure index step size range within which a factor will be applied to converge faster in the first frame

maxAdjFactor.description: Max factor to boost exposure adjustment in the first frame

tolMultUnitStepSize.description: Tolerance expressed as a multiple of unitStepSize

frameSkip.description: How many frames to skip between two adjustments. Depends on sensor sync

minSettledCount.description: How many frames without any adjustments before declaring the algorithm is settled

maxFrameConvTimeOut.description: Maximum duration of convergence, in frames

expTableIDPreFlash.description: Index of exposure table to use during preflash convergence

expTableIDMainFlash.description: Index of exposure table to use for flash snapshot

expTableIDFlashMeasurement.description: Index of exposure table to use during chromatix flash tuning

flashLuxTrigger.description: Lux hysteresis thresholds to trigger flash.

flashFDRequestDelayLuxTrigger.description: Lux hysteresis thresholds to request additional time for face detection to run

LEDTable.description: Tuning of LEDs for flash exposure conistency as well as color matching consistency for dual LED solutions

enableDualLED.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate this parameter. If project is using single LED set to false, if using dual LED set to true.

dualLEDIntersectSlope.description: For dual LED: intersection slope between measured AWB gray point and LED data in the r/g vs. b/g color domain

LEDPowerSize.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate this parameter. How many power levels are tuned.

LEDMixSize.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate this parameter. How many mixes are there for each power level

CCTTables.description: Tuning of LED parameters for both single and dual LED

LED1Setting.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Power level for LED1 in mA. Max value depends on hardware design and driver

LED2Setting.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Power level for LED2 in mA. Max value depends on hardware design and driver

RGRatio.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Red over green ratio for current mix

BGRatio.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Blue over green ratio for current mix

flux.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Influence of flash on scene in reference to entry in power level mix 0

CCTTables.description: Tuning of LED parameters for both single and dual LED

LED1Setting.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Power level for LED1 in mA. Max value depends on hardware design and driver

LED2Setting.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Power level for LED2 in mA. Max value depends on hardware design and driver

RGRatio.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Red over green ratio for current mix

BGRatio.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Blue over green ratio for current mix

flux.description: Use LED tuning tool to populate LED tuning table. Influence of flash on scene in reference to entry in power level mix 0

CCTTableCalibration.description: LED calibration controls. AEC LED calibration is tightly linked to AEC LED CCT table tuning

enableCornerSampleScreen.description: Enable screening calibration point to screen out obvious issues

LEDPowerIndex.description: Power index of LED point to calibrate

LEDMixIndex.description: Mix index of LED point to calibrate

LEDPowerIndex.description: Power index of LED point to calibrate

LEDMixIndex.description: Mix index of LED point to calibrate

LEDPowerIndex.description: Power index of LED point to calibrate

LEDMixIndex.description: Mix index of LED point to calibrate

LEDPowerIndex.description: Power index of LED point to calibrate

LEDMixIndex.description: Mix index of LED point to calibrate

RGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the r/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

BGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the b/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

RGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the r/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

BGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the b/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

RGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the r/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

BGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the b/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

RGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the r/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

BGRatioOKRange.description: Pass range of the b/g deviation percentage from golden device to device under test, for current calibration index. Calibration will fail if outside of this range.

LEDMeasConfig.description: Flash measurement configuration. These parameters apply to both flash tuning and flash calibration

frameErrAllowance.description: For either flash calibration or flash tuning: Frame to frame error allowance when computing average r/g and b/g ratios

numOfFrames.description: For either flash calibration or flash tuning: How many frames to average the average r/g b/g ratios

maxNumOfFrames.description: For either flash calibration or flash tuning: Maximum number of frames to try averaging r/g and b/g ratio when stats are not consistent (cf. error allowance) before stopping measurement

maxNumOfExtraAttempts.description: For either flash calibration or flash tuning: When a measurement fails we can allow some extra attempts. This parameter controls how many extra attempts in total are allowed

enableDerating.description: enable interpolation between power settings if max allowed power is below CCTTable max power

enableForceAFInLEDOnMode.description: Set to true to always run LED AF when LED is in force ON mode.
